title: Define Project Scope and Goals
description: Develop a clear definition of the SyntheticBiomeRegulator's scope and objectives.

title: Design the SyntheticBiomeRegulator Implant
description: Create a detailed design for the implant that will manage the body's microbiome.

title: Develop the Frontend Interface for User Interaction
description: Design and implement an intuitive user interface for interacting with the implant.

title: Implement Backend Logic for Bacterial Population Regulation
description: Write the code that will analyze and regulate bacterial populations.

title: Develop a Database for Storing Microbiome Data and User Profiles
description: Create a database schema for storing relevant microbiome data and user profiles.

title: Implement DevOps for Deployment and Maintenance
description: Set up CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure, and monitoring tools for deploying and maintaining the SyntheticBiomeRegulator.
dependencies: Develop a Database for Storing Microbiome Data and User Profiles

title: Conduct Quality Assurance Testing on the SyntheticBiomeRegulator
description: Test the implant to ensure it functions correctly and safely.
dependencies: Implement Backend Logic for Bacterial Population Regulation
Develop a Database for Storing Microbiome Data and User Profiles
Develop the Frontend Interface for User Interaction

title: Write Technical Documentation for the SyntheticBiomeRegulator
description: Create comprehensive documentation explaining the implant's operation, installation, and maintenance.
